org.sat4j.minisat.core
クラス CounterBasedPrimeImplicantStrategy

java.lang.Object
  org.sat4j.minisat.core.CounterBasedPrimeImplicantStrategy
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
PrimeImplicantStrategy
public class CounterBasedPrimeImplicantStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrimeImplicantStrategy

Counter based implementation of the model minimization strategy to compute a prime implicant. The main advantage of this method is to be linear in the size (in number of literals) of the formula. It's main drawback is to be limited to clauses (and cardinality constraints with some modifications). See our FMCAD 2013 paper for details.

作成者:
leberre

メソッドの詳細

compute

public int[] compute(Solver<? extends DataStructureFactory> solver)
インタフェース PrimeImplicantStrategy の記述:
returns a prime implicant from a solver object known to contain a model.

定義:
インタフェース PrimeImplicantStrategy 内の compute
戻り値:
an sequence of Dimacs literals corresponding to the implicant.

getPrimeImplicantAsArrayWithHoles

public int[] getPrimeImplicantAsArrayWithHoles()
インタフェース PrimeImplicantStrategy の記述:
returns the prime implicant as an array with hole. This is convenient to check if a particular variable belong to the prime implicant computed by PrimeImplicantStrategy.compute(Solver). Must be called after PrimeImplicantStrategy.compute(Solver).

定義:
インタフェース PrimeImplicantStrategy 内の getPrimeImplicantAsArrayWithHoles
戻り値:
